defs.name: initial_cache_size
defs.docs:
Initial size of 2D texture used as a gpu cache, pixels (width, height).
 The GPU cache will dynamically quadruple in size whenever the current size
 is insufficient.

attributes.value: / Initial size of 2D texture used as a gpu cache, pixels (width, height).
/ The GPU cache will dynamically quadruple in size whenever the current size

defs.name: gpu_cache_scale_tolerance
defs.docs:
Sets the maximum allowed difference in scale used for judging whether to reuse an
 existing glyph in the GPU cache.

attributes.value: / Sets the maximum allowed difference in scale used for judging whether to reuse an
/ existing glyph in the GPU cache.

defs.name: gpu_cache_position_tolerance
defs.docs:
Sets the maximum allowed difference in subpixel position used for judging whether
 to reuse an existing glyph in the GPU cache. Anything greater than or equal to
 1.0 means "don't care".

attributes.value: / Sets the maximum allowed difference in subpixel position used for judging whether
/ to reuse an existing glyph in the GPU cache. Anything greater than or equal to

defs.name: gpu_cache_align_4x4
defs.docs: Align glyphs in texture cache to 4x4 texel boundaries.

attributes.value: / Align glyphs in texture cache to 4x4 texel boundaries.
/ If your backend requires texture updates to be aligned to 4x4 texel
/ boundaries (e.g. WebGL), this should be set to `true`.

defs.name: cache_glyph_positioning
defs.docs:
Sets whether perform the calculation of glyph positioning according to the layout
 every time, or use a cached result if the input `Section` and `GlyphPositioner` are the
 same hash as a previous call.

attributes.value: / Sets whether perform the calculation of glyph positioning according to the layout
/ every time, or use a cached result if the input `Section` and `GlyphPositioner` are the
/ same hash as a previous call.
/ Improves performance. Should only disable if using a custom GlyphPositioner that is
/ impure according to it's inputs, so caching a previous call is not desired. Disabling

defs.name: cache_glyph_drawing
defs.docs: Sets optimising drawing by reusing the last draw requesting an identical draw queue.

attributes.value: / Sets optimising drawing by reusing the last draw requesting an identical draw queue.

defs.name: section_hasher
defs.value: pub fn section_hasher<T: BuildHasher>(Self, T) -> GlyphBrushBuilder
defs.docs:
Sets the section hasher. `GlyphBrush` cannot handle absolute section hash collisions
 so use a good hash algorithm.

attributes.value: / Sets the section hasher. `GlyphBrush` cannot handle absolute section hash collisions
/ so use a good hash algorithm.
/ This hasher is used to distinguish sections, rather than for hashmap internal use.
